pages.title: Blood Grate
pages.text: The blood grate is an essential block to keep your work space clean and collect blood. Placed this block beneath a hanging corpse before you bleed it and it will collect all of the blood and store it for later use. Without this blood will pour all over the floor.

The blood grate can be converted to collect and store blood from different mods, currently supported mods are:$(li)$(#f92020)Blood Magic$().$(li)$(#f92020)Hexerei$().$(li)$(#f92020)Vampirism$().$(li)To change the type of blood tank you'll need to right click it whilst holding the $(#f92020)Butchers Papers$().
